meta.description: Responsible spending is the key to a healthy budget

buttons.descReplace: All entries in the current tracker will be replaced with the entries from the imported tracker.
buttons.descDouble: A new tracker will be created with an updated identifier.

flash.trackerNeedToSave: Save the tracker to prevent data loss
flash.storagePersistDenied: Your browser may delete your data when storage is low. Export your trackers regularly to avoid data loss.
flash.trackerLoadedError: Error reading or parsing JSON file

error.parseJson: The file data does not match the expected structure

modal.titleDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this {{deleteEntity}}?

features.1: Your data never leaves your device — everything is saved in your browser, no account needed
features.2: Create as many separate trackers as you like — one for personal spending, one for work, etc.
features.3: Log both income and expenses, with a clear breakdown by month and year
features.4: Organize your records with tags — like 'groceries', 'rent', or anything that works for you
features.5: Visual charts help you see where your money goes at a glance
features.6: The amount field can work as a calculator too — just type something like 15+8.50 and it computes the total
features.7: Available in English, French and Russian
features.8: Back up your data anytime by exporting it as a file, and restore it just as easily
features.9: If you wish you can install it on your phone or desktop like a regular app

content.1: Your data is saved only on your device, in your browser's storage. We have no access to it whatsoever.
content.2: Nothing is ever sent to a server — your data is processed and stored entirely within your browser.
content.3: No cookies, no tracking, no analytics of any kind. Your usage stays completely private.
content.4: We share nothing with anyone — there's simply nothing to share.
content.5: You're in full control: export your data whenever you like, or wipe it all in one click.

content.1: SpendObserver is completely free — no subscription, no hidden fees, no registration required.
content.2: We recommend exporting your data regularly as a backup. Browsers can occasionally clear their own storage.
content.3: For the best experience — including more reliable data storage — install SpendObserver as an app on your device (it takes two clicks).
content.4: This is a personal project made with care but offered without formal guarantees. Your trust means a lot.
